translation: Yylhi zmyn yiyhi pnnhi skht binlhi sintụ̄ sytthah shdt san hilavnh.
Th ansan vanhi (ḥạran th pryshan spdith) aath kya chuh gomut.
Tamhi doh kri so pnnụ̄ ḥalat panh ẓạhr.
Aamhi mvjvb zi tuhndụ̄ rbn āsn amụ̄ sndi khạṭr tyz aisharh mskhr krụ̄mtụ̄ (yʿny asharn hnz zban mskhr krmcz).
Tamhi doh nyrn lukh mkhtlf drụ̄ bnith (byon byon ḥaltv san) takh timn yin tihindụ̄ aʿmal havnh.
Pth yymụ̄ dhrs brabr nyky āshi krmcz suh vuchhhi tath.
Th yymụ̄ dhrs brabr burạyy āshi krmcz suh (thi) vuchhhi tath.
